text: Adolf "Adi" Dassler (3 November 1900 - 6 September 1978) was a German businessman and entrepreneur. He was born in Herzogenaurach. He started the sportswear company Adidas. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biographie:Adidas Category:1900 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:German businesspeople Category:People from Bavaria
title: Adolf Dassler
